To Capital Disclosures A INVESTMENT HIGHLIGHTS We are downgrading EOTT Energy Partners to Outperform from Buy based in part on the reduced prospects for nearterm acquisitions We are also reducing our price target from to which is based on a cash distribution of and a yield of We are concerned about the lack of nearterm acquisition prospects for EOTT and the subsequent impact this will have on cash distribution coverage levels EOTTs coverage level of total units is estimated at for and for EOTTs unit price is already up through Q versus the SP which is down in the same period We believe further unit appreciation will likely be inhibited until coverage levels improve WE ARE DOWNGRADING EOTT ENERGY PARTNERS TO OUTPERFORM FROM BUYBASED IN PART ON THE REDUCED PROSPECTS FOR NEARTERM ACQUISITIONS We are also reducing our price target to from which is based on a cash distribution of and a yield of We are maintaining our earnings estimates for EOTT at for and for WE ARE CONCERNED ABOUT THE LACK OF NEARTERM ACQUISITION PROSPECTS FOR EOTT AND THE SUBSEQUENT IMPACT THIS HAS ON IMPROVING THE CASH DISTRIBUTION COVERAGE LEVELS We estimate that the total unit coverage level will be in increasing to in assuming a cash distribution of per unit EOTT will need to boost its distributable cash level by approximately million in order to reach the coverage level for all units in Without making an acquisition it is unlikely that EOTT will reach this coverage level before Furthermore although an acquisition would be accretive in the long run it would likely be dilutive to earnings and cash in the nearterm In the meantime EOTT has coverage support from Enron through UNIT PRICE APPRECIATION IS LIKELY TO BE INHIBITED UNTIL COVERAGE LEVELS IMPROVE FURTHER EOTTs unit price has appreciated through the end of Q as compared to the SP which is down during the same time period Including the cash distributions EOTTs return has been close to so far this year Company Description EOTT is one of the largest independent crude oil gathering and marketing companies in North America Crude is gathered from over producers with ownership of over wells Common carrier and proprietary pipelines transport EOTT and third party crude to market over a network of over miles of facilities This network moves over barrels per day EOTT also operates a small gas processing plant and associated fractionation facilities to provide blending stock for upgrading heavier less valued crudes gathered in California Margaret A Connerty Disclosure Legend ALehman Brothers Inc managed or comanaged
